title: Fix Provider::Google to use standard Generative Language API instead of Code Assist
description: Currently both Provider::Google (API key) and Provider::Gemini (OAuth) use GeminiOAuthClient which targets Code Assist API. Provider::Google should use generativelanguage.googleapis.com with API key auth. Reference: https://mariozechner.at/posts/2025-11-30-pi-coding-agent/ for API standards, model switching, models.dev integration.
